metadata.title: CVE-2022-34677 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: NVIDIA GPU Display Driver for Linux contains a vulnerability in the kernelmode layer handler, where an unprivileged regular user can cause an integerto be truncated, which may lead to denial of service or data tampering.

criterions.comment: nvidia-graphics-drivers-304: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
